titles.title: Mental Health Parity Reauthorization Act of 2003
Mental Health Parity Reauthorization Act of 2003

A bill to amend the Employee Retirement Income Security Act of 1974, the Public Health Service Act, and the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to extend the mental health benefits parity provisions for an additional year.

action.text: Introduced in the Senate. Read twice. Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under Read the First Time.

calendar.text: Read the second time. Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 400.

bill.summary: Mental Health Parity Reauthorization Act of 2003 - Amends the Employee Retirement Income Security Act of 1974 (ERISA), the Public Health Service Act, and the Internal Revenue Code to extend mental health parity provisions through 2004.
